headline: Cisco Schedules Conference Call for Q1 Fiscal Year 2026 Financial Results
summary: Cisco (NASDAQ: CSCO) has scheduled a conference call for Wednesday, Nov 12, 2025, at 1:30 PM (PT); 4:30 PM (ET) to announce its first quarter fiscal year 2026 financial results for the period ending Saturday, October 25, 2025.

headline: Cisco Stock Rises on Upgrade. Why This Analyst Says It’s a Smart AI Play.
summary: Quality tech names such as  Cisco Systems  have largely been an afterthought in an artificial intelligence race headlined by flashy growth stocks.  The investment bank upgraded Cisco stock to Buy from Neutral and lifted its price target to $88 from $74 in a weekend research note.  Cisco shares ticked up 1.9% to $74.49 on Monday.

headline: Netflix, Cisco, Roku: Top analyst calls
summary: Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma goes over some of Wall Street's top analyst calls today: Cisco (CSCO) getting upgraded to Buy from Neutral by UBS, Netflix (NFLX) getting upgraded by KGI Securities and President Capital Management, and Roku (ROKU) getting upgraded to Overweight from Neutral by Piper Sandler. headline: Amazon’s OpenAI Deal Is Boosting AI Stocks. The Rest of the Market Is Struggling.
summary: Stocks linked to the artificial intelligence rally were pretty much the only winners during Monday’s session. The Dow fell 410 points, or 0.9%. The S&P 500 was down 0.2%, but only 67 of its members were rising.

headline: Cisco launches localized computing device to handle AI workflows
summary: The new platform, named "Cisco Unified Edge," is an attempt to bring AI infrastructure closer to where the data is created - on shop and factory floors, for example - as traditional data centers become overburdened with complex commands, especially as agentic and reasoning models drive up network traffic.  The Cisco platform features an Intel chip and has seen an early adopter in Verizon.

headline: Cisco Debuts New Unified Edge Platform for Distributed Agentic AI Workloads
summary: CISCO PARTNER SUMMIT -- Today, Cisco (NASDAQ: CSCO) announced Cisco Unified Edge, an integrated computing platform for distributed AI workloads. From retail stores to healthcare facilities to factory floors, Cisco Unified Edge brings together compute, networking, storage, and security closer to the data for real-time AI inferencing and agentic workloads. This is critical to turning the AI vision into reality, providing the foundational infrastructure needed to support both traditional and AI wor

headline: Cisco Supercharges its Secure Enterprise Network Architecture for the AI Era
summary: CISCO PARTNER SUMMIT -- Following the launch of its AI-ready secure network architecture for enterprises, Cisco (NASDAQ: CSCO) is introducing innovations to modernize campus, branch, and industrial networks for the AI era. Cisco's solutions simplify operations, scale for evolving business needs, and enhance security — all critical for unlocking the full potential of enterprise AI. Designed to deliver automated deployment and security across highly distributed networks in minutes instead of month

headline: NWN Appoints Mike Qualley as Chief Operating Officer to Accelerate AI‑Powered Services Growth & Operational Excellence
summary: BOSTON, Mass., November 03, 2025--NWN, the leading provider of AI‑powered technology solutions, today announced the appointment of Mike Qualley as Chief Operating Officer (COO). Qualley will lead company‑wide operations with a mandate to drive Operational Excellence as the company scales NWN’s platform to support over 6000 clients across North America.

raw.headline: NWN Appoints Mike Qualley as Chief Operating Officer to Accelerate AI‑Powered Services Growth & Operational Excellence

Qualley will lead company‑wide operations with a mandate to drive Operational Excellence as the company scales NWN’s platform to support over 6000 clients across North America.

headline: Cisco Simplifies Security for Managed Service Providers, Accelerating Their Hybrid Mesh Firewall Deployments and Business Growth
summary: CISCO PARTNER SUMMIT -- Cisco (NASDAQ: CSCO), the global leader in networking and security, today announced a significant platform advancement designed to empower Managed Service Providers (MSPs) to efficiently and profitably deliver security services. This innovation adds foundational multi-customer management capabilities within Security Cloud Control, Cisco's unified, AI-powered management platform.

headline: UBS lifts Cisco to Buy, sees ’multi-year growth cycle’ driven by AI and security
summary: Investing.com -- UBS upgraded Cisco Systems to Buy from Neutral in a note on Monday, raising its price target for the stock to $88, citing a “multi-year growth cycle driven by AI infrastructure demand, a large-scale Campus refresh cycle, and momentum in Security.”

headline: Threat Intelligence Research Report 2025: A Global $22.97 Billion Market by 2030, Driven by Rising Cybercrime, Proactive Security Adoption, Strategic Alliances, and Increased Cybersecurity Funding
summary: The threat intelligence market is forecasted to expand from USD 11.55 billion in 2025 to USD 22.97 billion by 2030, at a CAGR of 14.7%. Key drivers include a shift to proactive security strategies and innovations in threat detection technologies, with cloud deployment dominating. The Asia Pacific region is expected to witness the highest growth, fueled by increasing cyber threats. Key players such as Palo Alto Networks, Cisco, and IBM are expanding capabilities, while the cloud model is favored
